arts.ttl: League Preview: Drogheda United -v- Sligo Rovers
arts.sum: Not ten minutes after going 2-0 in front, Sligo had pulled level through that nightâ€™s Man of the Match Owen Elding, and a James Bolger own goal and the points were shared. In the last twelve months, Drogheda have scored 13 goals against Sligo Rovers at home, winning 3-1, 7-0 and 3-0 respectively.
